name: Corporatism
description:
Explore the abandoned office.

Find the key items to trigger tracks from Elegance of the Damned & Wei’s debut album ‘Corporatism’.

Listen through the album in an immersive virtual environment with hallucinatory real-time visual effects.

Uncover the secrets of the Corporation.

Made in collaboration with Pure Life Records.

Controls:
  • Move: WASD
  • Look: Mouse
  • Interact: Left Mouse Button
  • Open Objectives menu: Right Mouse Button
  • Open Main Menu: Escape
